title: Wadi Murabba'at
description: The Wadi Murabba'at, known also as Nahal Darga, is a ravine in the Judean desert east of Bethlehem. Four cave sites were identified and excavated there in 1952. A fifth cave was identified in 1968.

properties.description: Representative location following Benoit, Milik and de Vaux 1961, verified in Google Earth 2016.
properties.title: Imagery location of Wadi Murabba'at
